DateTime::Locale::ja_JP(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DateTime::Locale::ja_JP(3)

NAME

DateTime::Locale::ja_JP

SYNOPSIS

  use DateTime;

  my $dt = DateTime->now( locale => 'ja_JP' );
  print $dt->month_name();

DESCRIPTION

This is the DateTime locale package for Japanese Japan.

DATA

This locale inherits from the DateTime::Locale::ja locale.

It contains the following data.

Days

Wide (format) 

  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX

  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X

  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X

Wide (stand-alone)

  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX
  XXX

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X

Narrow (stand-alone)

  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X
  X

Wide (format) 

  1X
  2X
  3X
  4X
  5X

Date Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5XXXX
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22XXXX
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15XXXX

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15X

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/02/05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/09/15

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 08/02/05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 95/12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/09/15

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/02/05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/09/15

Time Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18X30X30X UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9X05X02X UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4X44X23X UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

Datetime Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5XXXX18X30X30X UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22XXXX9X05X02X UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15XXXX4X44X23X UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5X18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22X09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15X04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/02/0518:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/229:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/09/154:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 08/02/0518:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 95/12/229:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/09/154:44

Default

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/02/0518:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/229:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/09/154:44:23

Available Formats

d (dX) 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15X

Ed (dX(EEE))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5X(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22X(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15X(X)

EEEd (d EEE)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 X

GGGGyMd (GGGGyXMXdX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XX2008X2X5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XX1995X12X22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XXX-10X9X15X

H (HX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4X

Hm (H:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44

hm (ah:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XX6:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XX9:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XX4:44

Hms (H:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23

hms (ah:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = XX6:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = XX9:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = XX4:44:23

M (L)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9

Md (M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/15

MEd (M/d(E))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/5(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/15(X)

MMdd (MM/dd)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 02/05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 09/15

MMM (LLL)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9X

MMMd (MXdX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2X5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12X22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9X15X

MMMEd (MXdX(E))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2X5X(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12X22X(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9X15X(X)

MMMMd (MXdX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2X5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12X22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9X15X

MMMMEd (MXdX(E))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2X5X(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12X22X(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9X15X(X)

ms (mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 44:23

y (y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10

yM (y/M)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/9

yMd (y/M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/9/15

yMEd (y/M/d(EEE))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/2/5(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12/22(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/9/15(X)

yMMM (yXMX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X

yMMMd (yXMXdX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15X

yMMMEd (yXMXdX(EEE))

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X5X(X)
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X22X(X)
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X15X(X)

yMMMM (yXMX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X

yQ (y/Q)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/1
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/4
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/3

yQQQ (yQQQ)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008Q1
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995Q4
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10Q3

yyMMM (yXMX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X2X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X12X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X9X

yyQ (yy/Q)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 08/1
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 95/4
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10/3

yyyy (yX)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008X
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995X
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10X

yyyyMM (yyyy/MM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008/02
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995/12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -010/09
